title: New: Fina Fisken – Save The Day
content:
Since the departure of Sarah P. from Keep Shelly In Athens was announced, many people have been eagerly anticipating her next move. Only a few months since she left KSIA, and new project Fina Fisken is already here, formed by Sarah P. and producer Hior Chronik. Save The Day is a sweet surprise that caught me off guard, its dancing house vibes draws its atmosphere from the same source that Factory Floor or even Max Cooper did, setting the mood for the dreamy, ethereal vocals of Sarah P. to kick in and elevate the whole experience to an otherworldly level. A mesmerising debut track that only promises the best and sucks the listener in to a dreamy state.
